translation.en: "Childhood is not from birth to a certain age."
translation.zh: 童年并不是从出生到某个时刻为止

translation.en: "And at a certain age, the child is grown and puts away childish things."
translation.zh: 也不是到了一定的年纪 就能长大成人 不再幼稚

translation.en: "Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies."
translation.zh: 童年是没有生老病死的国度

translation.en: You just have to break them in.
translation.zh: 你只要多练习练习就好了

translation.en: I've been breaking them in. For three days.
Just thinking it's a little much, you know?
The dress and the shoes... ...and all of this.
translation.zh: 你看 婚纱 鞋子 所有这些
不 这些都是必须的

translation.en: Where do you want them, boss?
On either side of the aisle.
- What aisle? - Does no one have vision?
translation.zh: 哪里有红毯？ 你们一点想象力都没有吗？

translation.en: You, go home and get lots of beauty sleep.
translation.zh: 你先回家 去睡个美容觉

translation.en: l was just checking for cold feet.
translation.zh: 我来看看你是不是紧张得手脚冰凉

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
What? Now you're having second thoughts?
translation.zh: 什么 你想改主意了？

translation.en: No, I've been waiting a century to marry you, Miss Swan.
translation.zh: 为了娶你我等了一个世纪 斯旺小姐

translation.en: l haven't told you everything about myself.
translation.zh: 其实你还没完全了解我
什么 你不是处男了？

translation.en: Look, you can't scare me away now.
Look, a few years after Carlisle created me...
translation.zh: 卡莱尔把我变成吸血鬼几年后

translation.en: l resented him for curbing my appetite.
translation.zh: 我憎恨他遏制我的欲望

translation.en: And so for a while, l went off on my own.
translation.zh: 有一阵子 我离家出走

translation.en: l wanted to know how it felt to hunt.

translation.zh: 爱德华 他们都是杀人犯

translation.en: You probably saved more lives than you took.
translation.zh: 你救的人或许比你杀的人更多

translation.en: Bella, that's what l told myself.
translation.zh: 贝拉 我也曾这么跟自己说

translation.en: But they were all human beings.
l looked into their eyes as they died and l saw who l was...
translation.zh: 他们临死时我从他们眼中看清了自己
我明白了自己所具有的能力

translation.en: And what I'll be capable of.
translation.zh: 而我也会拥有这样的能力

translation.en: Why are you telling me this tonight?
translation.zh: 你为什么今晚告诉我这些？

translation.en: Did you really think this was going to change my mind about you?
translation.zh: 你真觉得这会改变我对你的看法？

translation.en: l just wondered if it would change your mind about yourself...
translation.zh: 我想知道你会不会改变对自己的看法

translation.en: ...and who you want to see when you look in the mirror a year from now.
translation.zh: 一年后你想在镜子里看到怎样的自己

translation.en: l know l can do this.
You should give yourself some credit for that.
translation.zh: 你应该为自己感到骄傲

translation.en: Now, hopefully, a year from now...
...I am going to look in the mirror and see someone like you.
translation.zh: 我能在镜子中看到一个像你一样的人

translation.en: l mean, someone capable of courage and sacrifice and love.
translation.zh: 像你一样有胆识 无私 勇于去爱

translation.en: - Come on! Let's go! - I am late for my bachelor party.
translation.zh: 赶快 出发了！ 我要赶去我的单身派对了

translation.en: Send him out, Bella, or we're coming in after him.
translation.zh: 放他走吧 贝拉 要不我们要进来拉人了

translation.en: No, just a couple of mountain lions. Maybe a few bears.
translation.zh: 不会 会有几头山狮 可能再加几只熊

translation.en: Don't worry, Bella, we'll give him back in plenty of time.
translation.zh: 别担心 贝拉 我们会把他按时送回来的

translation.en: Ok, go, before they break my house.
translation.zh: 去吧 趁他们还没把屋子掀了

translation.en: I'll meet you at the altar.
I'll be the one in white.
What did l say about beauty sleep?
translation.zh: 不是让你睡个美容觉吗？
对不起 我做了个噩梦

translation.en: Please. I am not offended by your choice of groom.
translation.zh: 拜托 我并不是不喜欢你选的新郎

translation.en: Just my blatant lack of respect for mortality.
translation.zh: 只是无法接受不尊重生命的人
婚礼让大家走到了一起

translation.en: Hey, so, did you find our daughter?
You sure? l don't want to...
We thought you needed something blue.
translation.zh: 我们想着你需要点蓝色的东西
除了你妈这老古董之外 别那么损

translation.en: - lt was Grandmother Swan's. - But we added the sapphires.
translation.zh: 这是斯旺奶奶留下的 我们又加了一些蓝宝石

translation.en: Pass on to your daughter, and her daughter.
translation.zh: 你能传给你女儿 她又传给她女儿
别 别毁了我的杰作

translation.en: Do you want to see it? l want to see it!
translation.zh: 想看看吗？ 好期待啊

translation.en: They have got to be related.
So, you think Bella's going to be showing?
translation.zh: 你觉得贝拉的肚子会显出来吗？
杰西卡 她又没有怀孕

translation.en: Ok. Who else gets married at 18?
translation.zh: 好吧 可谁会在18岁就结婚啊

translation.en: Just don't let me fall, Dad.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are gathered here on this glorious day...
translation.zh: 各位 我们在这大喜之日齐聚一堂

translation.en: ...to witness the union of Edward Cullen and Bella Swan.
translation.zh: 共同见证 爱德华·库伦和贝拉·斯旺结合

translation.en: -Take you, Bella Swan. -To have and to hold.
translation.zh: 将与你 贝拉·斯旺 永结同心

translation.en: As long as we both shall live.
We were just saying how pretty everything is, you know, just saying.
translation.zh: 我们刚才还在聊这里布置得太漂亮了

translation.en: Well, thanks so much. You don't think it's too much?
translation.zh: 太谢谢了 你们不觉得太铺张吗？
嘿 兄弟 很高兴见到你

translation.en: - I am happy for you. - Thank you.
translation.zh: 替你感到高兴 谢谢你

translation.en: l hope you'll be happy, Bella.
translation.zh: 希望你能幸福 贝拉

translation.en: I am sure Jake wishes you the best.
translation.zh: 我相信雅各布也会祝福你的

translation.en: Well, l plan on getting drunk.
They're serving up some pretty fancy champagne.
Sue, can l get you a glass?
translation.zh: 苏 我帮你也拿一杯
谢谢 你们是艾丽莎和卡门吧？

translation.en: Yes, and these are our cousins from Alaska.
translation.zh: 对 这两位是从阿拉斯加来的堂姐妹

translation.en: - Tanya, Kate. - We've heard so much about you.
translation.zh: 塔尼娅和凯特 真是百闻不如一见
伊莉娜 过来见见贝拉

translation.en: - l can't do this. - You promised.
translation.zh: 我做不到 你答应过的
伊莉娜 他是我们的朋友

translation.en: He wanted to be like us.
To live in peace with humans.
Let's not monopolize the bride. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 我们别占着新娘了 恭喜你们

translation.en: Well, what's a wedding without some family drama?
translation.zh: 婚礼上怎么能少了家族闹剧呢？
是啊 抱歉 这个开了吗？

translation.en: Umm, I'd like to propose a toast.
Bella, I hope you've gotten enough sleep these last 18 years.
translation.zh: 贝拉 祝你18年来已经睡足了

translation.en: Because you won't be getting any more for a while.
translation.zh: 因为接下来你别想好好睡了

translation.en: Well, Bella was just like everybody else, totally mesmerized by Edward.
translation.zh: 贝拉和大家一样 被爱德华迷住了

translation.en: Or "The Hair," as l call him.
translation.zh: 被“帅毛”迷住了 我这么叫他

translation.en: Even though she's not the captain of the volleyball team.
translation.zh: 尽管她并不是排球队长

translation.en: I am just kidding. I am just kidding.
Or the president of the student council.
Edward will be a good husband.
I know this because I am a cop.
translation.zh: 我之所以知道 因为我是警察

translation.en: Like how to hunt somebody to the ends of the Earth.
translation.zh: 我懂怎么去追犯人 哪怕追到天涯海角

translation.en: ...you'll have to get over your aversion to fashion.
translation.zh: 你就得克服对时尚的反感

translation.en: And I know how to use a gun.

translation.zh: 睡吧睡吧 我亲爱的宝贝

translation.en: I'd like to thank Renne and Charlie...
...for bringing such a wonderful person into the world and into our lives.
translation.zh: 把这么好的姑娘带到了人世 带入我们的生活

translation.en: We will cherish and protect her forever.
translation.zh: 我们会永远珍惜她爱护她

translation.en: ...to meet someone who you can bare your soul to.
translation.zh: 能遇到一个 让你能敞开心扉的人

translation.en: And who will accept you for what you are.
I've been waiting, what seems like a very long time...
translation.zh: 我等这天已经等了很久

translation.en: ...I feel like I can finally begin.
So I'd like to propose a toast to my beautiful bride.
translation.zh: 我想敬我美丽的新娘一杯

translation.en: No measure of time with you will be long enough.
translation.zh: 和你共度的时光永远都觉得不够
让我们一起走到天荒地老

translation.en: Another one of your gifts just arrived.
What's a wedding present doing out here?
The best man didn't have time to get a tux.
translation.zh: 伴郎没时间去换礼服了

translation.en: I'll see if Rosalie wants to dance.
translation.zh: 我去看看罗莎莉想不想跳舞

translation.en: I am sorry I am late.
We were going to put your face on a milk carton.
translation.zh: 我们差点贴寻人启事了
大部分时间在加拿大北部

translation.en: It's weird to be back on two legs again, in clothes.
translation.zh: 重新穿上衣服用两条腿站着 有点怪

translation.en: Gotten out of practice with the whole human thing.
translation.zh: 我很久没有过人类的生活了

translation.en: Why? Afraid I'll trash your party?
translation.zh: 怎么 怕我会来砸场子吗？

translation.en: You'd think I'd be used to telling you goodbye by now.
translation.zh: 再说我都习惯跟你说再见了

translation.en: Come on, you're not supposed to be the one crying, Bella.
translation.zh: 别这样 该哭的人不是你 贝拉
每个人都会在婚礼上哭

translation.en: This is how I am going to remember you.
Because what, soon I am going to be dead to you?
translation.zh: 为什么？我对你来说就算死人了吗？

translation.en: I am just trying to appreciate your last night as a human.
translation.zh: 我只是想记住你作为人类的最后一夜

translation.en: Well, it's not my last night.
l didn't really want to spend my honeymoon writhing in pain.
translation.zh: 我可不想蜜月是在痛苦中度过

translation.en: What's the point? It's not like you're goin to have a real honeymoon with him, anyway.
translation.zh: 你和他又不能度真正意义的蜜月

translation.en: It's going to be as real as anyone else's.
translation.zh: 是真的 和其他人一样
什么？在你还是人类的时候？

translation.en: You can't be serious, Bella. Tell me you're not that stupid.
translation.zh: 你不是真这么想吧 贝拉？ 告诉我你没那么傻

translation.en: l mean, it's really none of your business.
- No! You can't do this! - Jake.
translation.zh: 不 你不能这么做 雅各布

translation.en: - Listen to me, Bella. - Jake, let me go!
Are you out of your mind? Huh? You'll kill her!
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？ 你会害死她的！

translation.en: You're not going to start something that we'll have to finish.
translation.zh: 别惹麻烦 我可不想帮你善后

translation.en: I am really, really, really stupid.
Come on, people are probably missing us. Let's go back.
translation.zh: 他们该找我们了 回去吧

translation.en: So, he really won't tell you where he's taking you?
translation.zh: 他不肯透露带你去哪儿度蜜月

translation.en: Everything's packed and ready to go.
translation.zh: 行李收拾好了 准备出发吧

translation.en: - I am going to see him. - Yeah.
It's going to be strange for me, too.
You know it will always be your home, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我那里永远都是你的家
我爱你 爸爸 永远爱你

translation.en: l always have and l always will.
translation.zh: 一直爱你 直到永远

translation.en: Go on. You don't want to miss your plane.
So, we're not staying in Rio?
translation.zh: 我们不住里约热内卢吗？

translation.en: lt was a gift from Carlisle.
l am nothing if not traditional.
You want to take a look around?
Do you want to go for a swim?
l could use a few human minutes.
translation.zh: 身为人类我要准备几分钟

translation.en: Don't take too long, Mrs. Cullen.
translation.zh: 别让我等太久 库伦太太

translation.en: Bella, l can't tell you how sorry l am.
Really, I am not. I am fine.
translation.zh: 真的 我没事 我很好

translation.en: Why can't you see how perfectly happy l am?
translation.zh: 你难道看不出我有多快乐吗？

translation.en: l mean, now I am sort of pissed off, actually.
You should be angry with me.
l mean, we knew this was going to be tricky, right?
translation.zh: 我们早知道这需要技巧

translation.en: l mean, it was amazing for me.
l know it's not the same for you...
translation.zh: 我知道你的感觉会不一样

translation.en: ...but for a human, l can't imagine that it gets any better than that.
translation.zh: 但对人类来说 已经不可能更好了

translation.en: ...was the best night of my existence.
translation.zh: 是我有生以来最美好的一晚

translation.en: You're not going to touch me again, are you?
translation.zh: 你不会再碰我了 是吗？

translation.en: You know that's not what l mean.
translation.zh: 你知道我指的不是这个

translation.en: lt was a really good dream.
Because l wanted it to be real.
Maybe they'll say she was in a car crash.
translation.zh: 也许他们会说她出车祸了

translation.en: Or tripped and fell off a cliff.
At least I'll get one thing out of it.
Cullens are not a danger to the town or the tribe.
translation.zh: 库伦一家并没有威胁 小镇或部落的安全

translation.en: Well, he's either going to kill her or change her.
translation.zh: 他会杀了她 或是让她变成吸血鬼

translation.en: - And the treaty says-- - l say, Jacob.
translation.zh: 契约里说 这里我做主 雅各布

translation.en: You know, if you wanted things different, you should've become alpha.
translation.zh: 你要想改变现状 你就得当首领

translation.en: Turning it down seemed like a good idea at the time.
translation.zh: 这时候推翻他的统治或许是个好主意

translation.en: Jake, you really think you could kill Bella if she comes back a vampire?
translation.zh: 雅各 要是贝拉变成了吸血鬼 你真会杀了她吗？

translation.en: No, make one of us do it, then hold a grudge against us.
translation.zh: 不 他会让我们中的一个去杀 然后把怨恨都发泄在我们身上

translation.en: Would you just get over it? It's not like you've imprinted on her.
translation.zh: 你怎么就放不下呢？ 她又没烙印在你身上
至少他们看起来很幸福

translation.en: Yeah, some people are just lucky, l guess.
translation.zh: 是啊 有些人确实是很幸运

translation.en: None of them belong to themselves anymore.
translation.zh: 他们都不再属于自己了

translation.en: And the sickest part is their genes tell them they're happy about it.
translation.zh: 而最恶心的是 他们的基因让他们自以为很快乐

translation.en: Least if you imprinted on someone, you'd finally forget about Bella.
translation.zh: 当你被烙印后 就可以忘掉贝拉

translation.en: l mean, being any kind of happy is better than being miserable...
translation.zh: 我是说 无论哪种快乐都比 沉浸在无法拥有的痛苦中要好
沉浸在无法拥有的痛苦中要好

translation.en: Bella, these are our housekeepers, Gustavo and Kaure.
translation.zh: 贝拉 他们是房子的管家 古斯塔沃和卡洛

translation.en: Well, l guess we just leave them to it.
Because l have you here all alone.
translation.zh: 因为你单独和我在一起

translation.en: You mean she knows about you?
She's native Ticuna. They have legends about blood-drinking demons...
translation.zh: 她是图库纳土著 他们有关于吸血恶魔的传说
那些吸血恶魔会专门诱骗漂亮女人

translation.en: You don't need to see this.
translation.zh: 我不想让你看到我这样
无论健康或是疾病 还记得吗？

translation.en: lt must have been the chicken.
How many days has it been since the wedding?
Will you tell me what's going on?

translation.zh: 爱丽丝 贝拉 你没事吧？
为什么？出什么事了？我刚刚…
爱丽丝 你看到什么了？

translation.en: - Here's Carlisle. - Bella, what's going on?
translation.zh: 我叫卡莱尔来 贝拉 怎么了？

translation.en: l don't know. I am a little worried. Can vampires go into shock?
translation.zh: 我有点担心 吸血鬼也会被吓愣吗？

translation.en: l know that it's impossible, but l think that I am pregnant.
translation.zh: 我知道这不可能 但我觉得我怀孕了

translation.en: Carlisle, l swear, something just moved inside me.
translation.zh: 我发誓刚刚有东西在我肚子里动

translation.en: - ls this even possible? - I don't know.
translation.zh: 有这种可能吗？ 我不知道

translation.en: The sooner Bella's here, the sooner we can find out what it is.
translation.zh: 她越快回来 我们就能越早弄清楚

translation.en: I need you to get to the mainland at once.
Kaure's making sure you're still alive.
translation.zh: 卡洛想知道你是不是还活着

translation.en: What did you do with her?
What do you know about this?
l know that you are a demon!
Her people have legends. She might have seen this before.
translation.zh: 土著有传说 也许她以前见过这种情况

translation.en: Please. Tell me how to help her.
translation.zh: 求求你告诉我怎么才能救她

translation.en: Tell me how she can survive this.
translation.zh: 告诉我怎样才能让她活下去

translation.en: I am not going to let it hurt you.
Carlisle will get that thing out.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔会把这东西拿出来的
我去装东西 你稍等我一下

translation.en: - What's going on? - l need your help.
Hey, haven't seen you in a while.
- You ok? - So, you finally heard from Bella?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？ 你终于有贝拉的消息了？

translation.en: They want to wait until she feels better before they travel.
translation.zh: 他们想等到她情况好点再启程

translation.en: Yeah, she told me not to worry, but she sounded...
translation.zh: 她让我别担心 但是听起来她有点…
我不知道 心神不宁
雅各布 你别插手了

translation.en: Listen, just give it to me straight.
-She's here? -They came home two weeks ago.
translation.zh: 她就在这里？ 他们回来两周了
别靠太近 关你什么事？

translation.en: Yeah, it's nice to see you, too.
So, are you going to tell me what's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你打算告诉我怎么回事吗？

translation.en: Rose, you want to help me up?
translation.zh: 罗莎莉 你扶我起来

translation.en: We didn't know it was even possible.
- What is it? - I am not sure.
Ultrasounds and needles won't penetrate the embryonic sac.
translation.zh: 超声波和针头都没法穿透胚囊

translation.en: And l can't see Bella's future anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也看不到贝拉的未来了

translation.en: We've been researching legends, but there isn't much to go on.
translation.zh: 我们研究了各种传说 但没多大用

translation.en: What we do know is that it's strong. And fast-growing.
translation.zh: 只知道它很结实 发育很快

translation.en: Why haven't you done anything? Take it out of her!
translation.zh: 你就这样袖手旁观吗？ 把它取出来啊

translation.en: This is none of your business, dog.
translation.zh: 这里没你什么事 狗仔

translation.en: All this fighting isn't good for Bella.
translation.zh: 这样吵对贝拉没什么好处

translation.en: The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.zh: 这胚胎对贝拉也没有好处

translation.en: Say the word, Alice. "Baby." It's just a little baby.
translation.zh: 好好说话 爱丽丝 宝宝 它只是个小宝宝

translation.en: Carlisle, you've got to do something.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔 你得做点什么

translation.en: It's not his decision. It's not any of yours.
translation.zh: 这不由他决定 也不由你们决定

translation.en: Jacob, l need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 雅各布 我需要跟你谈谈

translation.en: l always knew you'd destroy her.
She thinks Carlisle can turn her at the last minute...
translation.zh: 她觉得卡莱尔能在最后一刻转变她

translation.en: ...like he did for me and Esme.
translation.zh: 就像对我和埃斯米所做的那样
能行吗？ 可能性 很小

translation.en: Look, Jacob, l need you to do something for me.
translation.zh: 雅各布 请你为我做件事

translation.en: You have a connection with her that I'll never understand.
translation.zh: 你和她有种深层的纽带 是我没办法理解的

translation.en: Maybe you could talk to her, change her mind.
translation.zh: 也许你能和她聊聊 让她回心转意
罗莎莉 我没事 真的

translation.en: - So, Edward sent you in here to talk to me? - Sort of.
translation.zh: 爱德华让你来跟我谈？ 算是吧

translation.en: Though l can't figure out why he thinks you'd listen to me.
translation.zh: 虽然我不懂他为什么觉得你会听我的

translation.en: l mean, you never have before.
Since when are you and blondie BFFs?
translation.zh: 你什么时候 跟那个金发妞变成闺蜜了？
罗莎莉知道我想要什么
你怎么考虑的 贝拉？

translation.en: l know this seems like a scary thing...
translation.zh: 这件事看起来挺可怕 其实…

translation.en: It's like this miracle or something.
So, it's a bouncing baby boy.
translation.zh: 所以这是个活蹦乱跳的男孩

translation.en: I am sorry l didn't know. Should've brought some blue balloons.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不知道 我该带点蓝色气球来

translation.en: When l picture him, l see a boy.
translation.zh: 我每次想到他 就浮现男孩的样子

translation.en: - I am strong enough. - Come on.
You can spout that crap to your bloodsucker, but you don't fool me.
translation.zh: 这种话也就能哄哄那只吸血鬼 但你骗不了我

translation.en: l can see what that thing's doing to you. It's a killer, Bella.
translation.zh: 我知道这玩意儿会怎么样 它会杀了你 贝拉

translation.en: - You're wrong. - And when you die...
translation.zh: 你错了 要是你死了 还有什么意义？

translation.en: ...what was the point? Of me loving you, you loving him.
translation.zh: 要是你死了 还有什么意义？ 就算我爱你 你爱他

translation.en: How is that right for anyone?
translation.zh: 而这会对大家有好处吗？

translation.en: Because l sure don't see it.

translation.zh: 听我说 贝拉 求你了

translation.en: Jake, everything's going to be ok.
translation.zh: 雅各 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: And I am not sticking around to watch.
translation.zh: 我不想眼睁睁就这么看着

translation.en: Jacob! Jake, I can do this. I can do this.
This is none of your business, dog.
translation.zh: 这里没你什么事 狗仔

translation.en: The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.zh: 这个胚胎对贝拉没好处

translation.en: Don't you even care that it's killing you?
- Is it true, Jacob? - What will it be?
translation.zh: 是真的吗？它是什么东西？
-它发育得很快 -这不正常 危险

translation.en: - Monstrosity. - An abomination. On our land.
translation.zh: 怪胎 不祥的东西 在我们的领土上

translation.en: - We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
translation.zh: 绝不能容忍 绝不能容忍

translation.en: - We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
We have to protect the tribe.
What they've bred won't be able to control its thirst.
translation.zh: 她生下的东西肯定会嗜血成性

translation.en: Every human will be in danger.
translation.zh: 所有的人类都会有危险

translation.en: - We're ready. - No time to waste.
translation.zh: 我们准备好了 别再等了

translation.en: We must destroy it before it's born.
translation.zh: 我们必须在它出生前消灭它

translation.en: Bella's human. Our protection applies to her.
translation.zh: 贝拉是人类 我们也要保护她

translation.en: We have real enemies to fight tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我们要和真正的敌人决斗

translation.en: You will fight with us, Jake.
translation.zh: 你要和我们并肩作战 雅各布

translation.en: I am the grandson of Ephraim Black.
translation.zh: 我是以法莲·布莱克的子孙

translation.en: I am the grandson of a chief!
I wasn't born to follow you, or anyone else.
translation.zh: 我不是生来要听命于你或其他任何人

translation.en: Don't worry. They're not following us.
translation.zh: 别担心 他们没跟过来

translation.en: What do you think you're doing here?
- l left Sam's pack. - Go home, Seth.
translation.zh: 我离开山姆他们了 回家吧 赛斯

translation.en: - l won't stand behind him. - Oh, yes, you will.
translation.zh: 我不要再跟随他了 不 快回去

translation.en: I am not kidding. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑 快离开这儿

translation.en: ls that an order? Going to make me bow down, too?
translation.zh: 这是命令吗？ 你也要我对你俯首帖耳？

translation.en: Look, I am just going off on my own here, ok?
Great, and I've got your back.
...are you really ready to fight your own brothers?
translation.zh: 你真的愿意迎战你的兄弟们？

translation.en: If it's the right thing to do.
I am going to go give the Cullens a heads-up.
translation.zh: 我要去给库伦家提个醒

translation.en: How cool is this? Two-man pack. Two against the world.
translation.zh: 酷毙了 双狼组 孤身斗群侠

translation.en: You're getting on my nerves, Seth.
translation.zh: 别那么多废话 赛斯

translation.en: They're not going to touch her.
translation.zh: 他们别想碰她一根毫毛

translation.en: Man, l can smell them from all the way out here.
translation.zh: 我闻到他们正朝这边来了

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here?
I am not going to let my little brother get himself killed.
translation.zh: 我不能让我的弟弟去送死

translation.en: Go away, Leah! l can take care of myself.
translation.zh: 走开 莉亚 我会照顾好自己的

translation.en: That you think so proves you need a babysitter.
translation.zh: 这么幼稚 只能证明你需要有人看着

translation.en: Ok, would the both of you shut up?
Sam doesn't even know l left.
l think he just figured it out.
l know what his plan is.
Sam's lost the element of surprise...
translation.zh: 山姆失去了突袭的机会

translation.en: ...and he doesn't want to take you on outnumbered...
...so he's not going to come at you head on.
He's got the place surrounded and he'll wait for his opportunity.
translation.zh: 他已经包围了这里 准备伺机而动

translation.en: We won't get through without a fight. No fights.
translation.zh: -如果不打硬仗 他也进不来 -不和他们打

translation.en: We won't be the ones to break the treaty.
The treaty is void, at least in Sam's mind.
translation.zh: 契约已经失效了 至少山姆这么认为

translation.en: Carlisle, no one's hunted for weeks.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔 我们已经好几周没去捕猎了

translation.en: You've done us a great service, Jacob.
translation.zh: 你帮了我们大忙了 雅各布

translation.en: l know they're out there somewhere, but l can't hear them anymore.
translation.zh: 他们就在这附近 但我再也听不到他们了

translation.en: l stopped hearing them, too, the second l decided to leave.
translation.zh: 我也听不到了 从我离开的那一刻起

translation.en: You know you can't stay here.
translation.zh: -你清楚你不能留在这里 -但我没地方可去

translation.en: - But l don't have any place... - l can't trust you with the Cullens.
translation.zh: -你清楚你不能留在这里 -但我没地方可去 我不信你会帮库伦家

translation.en: l just have to follow you.
Look, Seth doesn't want you here. Neither do l.
translation.zh: 赛斯不希望你在这儿 我也不想

translation.en: Being unwanted isn't exactly a new thing for me.
translation.zh: 我也不是第一次被人嫌弃了

translation.en: Look, I'll stay out of your way.
translation.zh: 听着 我不会妨碍你

translation.en: ...except go back to Sam's pack and be the pathetic ex-girlfriend he can't get away from.
translation.zh: 只要别让我回山姆那里 去做他那个无法摆脱的可悲的前女友

translation.en: You don't know how many times l wished l could imprint on someone.
translation.zh: 你不懂我多想找到我的烙印爱人

translation.en: I am going to do a perimeter run. You got my flank?
translation.zh: 我要在四周巡逻一下 你陪我一起去

translation.en: But there are no splinters. You haven't punctured anything.
translation.zh: 还好没裂成碎片 没刺穿到内脏
现在确实还没 爱德华
它现在弄断了你的骨头

translation.en: It's crushing you from the inside out.
translation.zh: 正在从里向外挤压着你

translation.en: Carlisle, tell her what you told me. Tell her.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔 把你跟我说的告诉她 告诉她

translation.en: Carlisle, tell me. It's all right.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔 告诉我吧 没事的

translation.en: The fetus isn't compatible with your body.
translation.zh: 你的身体容不下这个胎儿

translation.en: lt won't allow you to get the nutrition you need.
translation.zh: 不让你去吸收所需的营养

translation.en: It's starving you by the hour.
l can't stop it, and l can't slow it down.
translation.zh: 我阻止不了 也没法让它慢下来

translation.en: At this rate, your heart will give out before you can deliver.
translation.zh: 还没到生下它 你的心脏就不堪重负了

translation.en: Then I'll hold on as long as l can, and then...
There are some conditions that even venom can't overcome.
translation.zh: 有些情况是吸血鬼毒液也无法挽救的

translation.en: You won't. You're going to have a part of me.
translation.zh: 不会的 我会留下我的骨肉

translation.en: Do you honestly think that l could love it or even tolerate it if it killed you?
translation.zh: 你觉得如果它把你害死了 我还能去爱它 包容它吗？

translation.en: You have to accept what is.
Because you've given me no choice!
translation.zh: 我根本没有选择的余地！

translation.en: Bella, we're supposed to be partners, remember?
translation.zh: 我们本该相互扶持 你忘了吗？

translation.en: But you decided this on your own.
Well, l have no other way to see it.
Because it's me who'll lose you.
Smile like I am your favorite person in the world.
translation.zh: 这笑容会让我觉得我是你最爱的人

translation.en: Feels complete when you're here, Jake.
translation.zh: 有你在就圆满了 雅各布

translation.en: We need to find a way to get some food into her system.
translation.zh: 我们必须让她吃点东西

translation.en: - If l could only see the fetus... - The baby.
...maybe l could figure out what it wants.
translation.zh: 我或许能弄清它想要什么

translation.en: lt wasn't an idea. lt was a snide comment.
translation.zh: 不算什么主意 只是个恶毒的想法

translation.en: That it's probably just looking for someone to sink its teeth into.
translation.zh: 或许它是想找个人来磨磨它的尖牙

translation.en: If it's craving, it's not going to want animal blood.
translation.zh: 要是有这种欲望 它不会想喝动物的血

translation.en: l have some O negative laid aside for Bella.
You're going to make her drink that?
It's the fastest way to test the theory.
Only if you're comfortable with it.
l think I am going to be sick.
This might make it a little easier to take.
Your pulse is already getting stronger.
- Well, you sound better. l am.
This whole thing must've put a kink in the honeymoon, huh?
translation.zh: 你们的蜜月肯定受到影响了吧？

translation.en: Otherwise, married life treating you ok?
translation.zh: 那么婚后生活还满意吗？

translation.en: Edward still walks on water and all that?
translation.zh: 爱德华还是那种完美男人吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but, l mean, it is different now.
translation.zh: 是的 不过关系有些变化

translation.en: The important thing is that you're better.
And that you're coming home soon, right?
translation.zh: 你很快就能回家了 是吧？

translation.en: Ok, Dad, l don't want you to freak out...
translation.zh: 好了 爸爸 我不想吓你

translation.en: ...but I am going to a medical center in Switzerland.
translation.zh: 我准备去瑞士的医疗中心

translation.en: What? No, no, you're not. You're not going to Switzerland.
translation.zh: 什么？你不能去瑞士 你不是说你好多了吗？

translation.en: What are you... You said you were better.
No, Bella. I am getting on a plane. No.
translation.zh: 不 贝拉 我现在就飞过去

translation.en: It's really more of a spa.
translation.zh: 我只是去做一次… 水疗

translation.en: And I am sure that I'd be better by the time you got there anyway.
translation.zh: 你还没到我就会没事了

translation.en: ...like I am sitting on the couch with you, eating pizza or something.
translation.zh: 就当我和你坐沙发上吃披萨之类的
就当我原来在你身边那样

translation.en: Dad, l got to go, ok?
I am sorry I've been so angry.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我上次对你发脾气

translation.en: I've left you alone in this.
Well, they say the first year is the hardest.
He likes the sound of your voice.
He likes my voice as well.
l thought he was like me, but he's not. He's like you.
translation.zh: 我以为他会像我 但其实他像你

translation.en: Of course you're happy. How could you not be?
translation.zh: 你应该开心 怎么能不开心？

translation.en: So, that's the last of it?
Bella could deliver as early as tomorrow.
If she's going to have any chance at all, she'll need more blood.
translation.zh: 如果她挺过来了 会需要更多的血

translation.en: You have to be at your strongest for her. We need to go tonight.
translation.zh: 你得保持最佳状态 我们今晚就得觅食
卡莱尔 你现在是他们的敌人

translation.en: Sam won't hesitate. You will be slaughtered.
translation.zh: 山姆绝不会手软 你会被碎尸万段
艾米特会和我们一起去

translation.en: - That won't be enough. - We have no choice, Jacob.
translation.zh: -那也不够 -我们别无他法 雅各布

translation.en: If there's anything we can do to save her, we have to try.
translation.zh: 只要能够救她 我们就得试试

translation.en: - You'd risk your lives for her? - Of course we would.
translation.zh: 为了她你可以不顾生命安危？ 当然 贝拉现在是我们的亲人

translation.en: Bella's a part of our family now.
translation.zh: 当然 贝拉现在是我们的亲人

translation.en: As strong as the one l was born into.
l know what l have to do.
We should phase, Jacob. We can't protect ourselves like this.
translation.zh: 我们得变身 雅各布 要不没法防卫

translation.en: They'll see it as a threat.
Be easier if l could hear you, too.
translation.zh: 如果你们现身会方便些
这儿不再是你的领地了

translation.en: - How's the new family working out? - You done?
translation.zh: 你的新家怎么样？ 你有完没完？
想回家了吗 雅各布？

translation.en: l want Sam to take back Leah and Seth.
translation.zh: 我希望山姆能重新接受莉亚和赛斯

translation.en: l need Sam to wait until Bella's been separated from the problem.
translation.zh: 我希望山姆等到贝拉把孩子生出来

translation.en: Tell Sam that when the moment comes, I'll be the one to destroy it.
translation.zh: 告诉山姆 等它出生时 我会亲手把它干掉

translation.en: I am the only one who can.
Can't we come up with something just a little more classic?
translation.zh: 你不能想个更传统的名字吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's not like I am the one carrying a demon.
translation.zh: 没事 怀着恶魔的又不是我

translation.en: Why don't you tell Jacob what you've decided?
translation.zh: 你把决定告诉雅各布吧

translation.en: Rose is trying to talk Bella out of her baby names.
translation.zh: 罗丝想说服贝拉别给孩子取那些名字

translation.en: Well, then I am on your side no matter what you picked.
Ok, fine, that one's not awful.
Why don't you tell him the girl's name?
l was playing around with our moms' names.
translation.zh: 我想用我们妈妈的名字

translation.en: Renne and Esme. And l was thinking...
translation.zh: 瑞妮和埃斯米的结合 我想叫她…
瑞妮斯米 瑞妮斯米

translation.en: And it's unique, which certainly fits the situation.
translation.zh: 很特别 也很适合现在的情况
我喜欢瑞妮斯米这个名字
罗莎莉 把吗啡给我

translation.en: Carlisle said the placenta must have detached.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔说肯定是胎盘脱落了

translation.en: - He's coming as fast as he can, but... - We'll have to do it.
translation.zh: 他会尽快赶回来 得赶快动手
罗莎莉 先让吗啡扩散
来不及了 孩子会死的

translation.en: Alice, get her out of here!
translation.zh: 爱丽丝 把她带出去！

translation.en: Save her! You've got to change her!
translation.zh: 救救她 快把她变成吸血鬼

translation.en: l can't, not whilst he's still in there.
translation.zh: 不行 孩子还没生出来

translation.en: l got to get him out first.
Stay, Bella. Stay focused. Keep your heart beating.
translation.zh: 坚持住 集中精神 努力挺住
雅各布 你抱着孩子

translation.en: l promise I am ok. Let me.
You deserve to live with this.
You're not dead. You're not dead.
No, it will work. lt will work.
translation.zh: 不 会起作用的 有作用的

translation.en: Come back to me, please, baby.
translation.zh: 快醒醒 求求你 亲爱的

translation.en: l don't care what he's done.
- He's still my son. - I am sorry, Billy.
translation.zh: 他始终是我儿子 抱歉 比利

translation.en: l just thought you should know.

translation.zh: 就像… 不可抗拒的力量
你的整个世界为之改变

translation.en: Suddenly, it's not the Earth holding you here.
translation.zh: 忽然之间 周围的一切都不再重要

translation.en: You would do anything, be anything she needs.
translation.zh: 你可以为她做任何事 只要她需要

translation.en: You're going to be all right.

translation.zh: 我们势单力薄 敌我差距悬殊

translation.en: l won't let them hurt my family.
translation.zh: 我不会让他们伤害我的家人

translation.en: If you kill her, you kill me.
translation.zh: 你们要想杀她 就先过了我这关

translation.en: Whoever a wolf imprints on can't be harmed.
translation.zh: 狼人的烙印爱人 不能受到伤害

translation.en: - Maybe l was too late. - No, Edward.
translation.zh: 或许是因为太晚了 不 你听听她的心跳
不 你听听她的心跳

translation.en: Which is spelt with an "S," Sweet Bianca.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔的拼写里应该有个S 亲爱的比安卡

translation.en: He's added a new member to his coven.
At least our dispute with the Cullens is over.
translation.zh: 那至少我们 和库伦家的争端就此结束了

translation.en: Our dispute goes far beyond the fate of a mere human.
translation.zh: 我们的问题可不能 靠一个凡人的命运就决定

translation.en: Why, brother, l thought you understood.
translation.zh: 我亲爱的兄弟 我还以为你知道
